sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.dakaPage(v-if='dakaPage')
        .buttona(v-if="show")
        .date {{ date }}
        .note {{ note }}
        .time {{ currentTime }}
        transition(name="button" mode="out-in")
            router-link.button(v-if="!show" @click.native="show=!show" to="/dakaed") {{ button }}

</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    date: '',
            currentTime: '',
            note: '勇威，昨晚睡得好嗎？',
            show: false,
            button: '打卡'
  }), 
    methods: {
        updateCurrentTime() {
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            moment().format();
            this.currentTime = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
            this.date = moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD ddd")
        },
        buttontr () {


        }

    },

    created() {
        setInterval(() => this.updateCurrentTime(), 1 * 1000);
    }
};
</script>

<style>
  .rectButton {
  border: none;
  padding: 25px;
  width: 200px;
  line-height: 40px;
  margin: auto;
  margin-top: 25%;
  color: #FFF;
  transition: 0.6s;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.rectButton:hover {
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4);
}
</style>
